text: Leyla Shahin Usta (Born in 8, March 1973, in Istanbul, Turkey) is a Turkish politician, physician, member of the Turkish Parliament and the Justice and Development Party in Turkey. == Biography == She completed her medical education at the University of Vienna in 2003. Leyla worked as a doctor until 2015. She was a deputy from Turkish city of Konya She speaks German and English, Leyla is married and has 2 children. in August 2018, She became the Vice President in charge of Human Rights in Ak Party == References == Category:1973 births Category:Politicians from Istanbul
title: Leyla Shahin Usta
